titleStmt.title: Proclamation for the more easie stating and inbringing of the pole-money, and for bringing in lists of what is payed of the hearth-money
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

titleStmt.title: Proclamation for the more easie stating and inbringing of the pole-money, and for bringing in lists of what is payed of the hearth-money
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Eliot, Gilbert, Sir, 1651-1718.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the heirs & successors of A. Anderson,

notesStmt.note: "Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh the second Day of August, And of Our Reign the Sixth Year, 1694. Per Actum Dominorum Secreti Consili. Gilb: Eliot, Cls. Sti. Consilii."
Imprint information supplied by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Aberdeen City Charter Room, (Aberdeen, Scotland).

person.persName: the heirs & successors of A. Anderson
